Company: Stanza (https://stanza.co)

Location: San Francisco

Visa: offer TN visas and visa transfers

Roles: Software Engineers (backend, front-end) | Comp: $130-$150K + significant equity + benefits

Job Descriptions: check out our website at https://angel.co/stanza-1/jobs

About the company: Founded in 2012 and located in San Francisco in the Design District, Stanza is a smart calendar company... without an app. Our smart Add-to-Calendar button powers calendar subscriptions for over 5000 publishers. We work with most major sports teams (NFL, NBA, NHL, NCAA) and broadcasters (ESPN, SiriusXM). In the past year, over 70M events have been synced to 2M users' calendars. Our technology then surfaces the right content for users within their calendars - tickets & parking info for sporting events, coach interviews, etc. Our tech is also calendar & device agnostic.

I'm happy to answer any questions at smita@stanza.co
